snippet: What shows do you watch? Do you notice the ethnicity and race of the actors and characters on your favorite shows? Does it matter to you?
abstract: What shows do you watch? Do you notice the ethnicity and race of the actors and characters on your favorite shows? Does it matter to you?
lead_paragraph: “Saturday Night Live” does not have a black woman as a cast member, a fact that has become a hotly discussed issue. The debate raises a larger issue that seems to come up again and again: Is television too white?

headline.main: Does TV Capture the Diversity of America Yet?
